name: 000Webhost
description: Go to "Profile > Delete My Account" and select why you are deleting your account.

name: 1Password
description: Login to your account, go to profile, click 'Permanently Delete Account'. Confirm by entering 'I am sure' and click 'Delete Account'.

name: 280daily
description: Enter your account password and click on 'DELETE ACCOUNT'.

name: 500px
description: On Account Settings, under "Please choose your issue below", select "Delete Account", fill the form and submit.

name: 7digital
description: Email customer service using their web contact form and ask them to delete your account.

name: 9GAG
description: Login to your account, go to parameters, click Delete my account. Confirm by clicking I want to delete my account. And again by clicking Delete my 9GAG account.

name: AbeBooks
description: Select 'Something else' and then 'Close my account' and fill out the e-mail form.

name: Acasa
description: In your account settings choose 'Remove my account' at the bottom.

name: Acorns
description: You have to contact customer support to deactivate your account. Can be reactivated again.

name: Adfly
description: Contact the customer support using the contact form and request the deletion of your account.

name: Airbnb
description: Your account can be deleted by contacting support, although some pertinent information may be retained as legally required.

name: Alibaba
description: Despite what it says in their FAQ there is actually no automatic way to delete your account. But they do see to be happy to do it if you ask them - you can contact them via their Contact Us page.

name: AliExpress
description: To delete your account, go to the "My AliExpress" page, click on "Account Settings"->"Edit Settings" then "Edit Member Profile" and click on "Deactivate Account" button. On the deactivation page, there is an option "Release my account at the same time", click it and confirm so that data will be permanently deleted along with your account.

name: Alvanista
description: Follow the link to edit your profile and click cancel account at bottom.

name: Amara
description: Just head to the account page and click the red button 'Delete your account' at the bottom left of the page.

name: Amazon
description: To close your account, contact Amazon by email (via this contact form) and request that your account be closed.

name: Amazon AWS
description: You must login before visiting the link.

name: Android File Host (AFH)
description: Contact the customer support using the contact form and request the deletion of your account.

name: Angelist
description: Click delete account once logged in.

name: Animal Crossing Community
description: We do not 'delete' or 'terminate' accounts on ACC. If you no longer wish to use the site, you may delete all personal information from your profile and then stop logging in.

name: AnkiApp
description: Log in to your account and click 'Delete Account'. Confirm by entering your password and click 'OK'. You cannot delete your account via web.ankiapp.com - please visit join.ankiapp.com instead.

name: AnkiWeb
description: Confirm by entering your e-mail address and click 'Remove'.

name: Any.do
description: You can only delete your account via the mobile app: install the app, log in, click Profile, click Delete Account.

name: Apex Minecraft Hosting
description: You need to log into your billing panel and send a ticket regarding the account deletion. If you only have a multicraft account, you can send a ticket without logging in.

name: AppFog
description: Remove all applications and services from your account, then request deletion by emailing customer services.

name: Arcor.de
description: Only viable if you have online accounts only.

name: The Artist Union
description: Login to your account first. Click 'Delete Account' and confirm by clicking 'Ok'.

name: Asgardia.space
description: You have to send an e-mail and request for account deletion, which might take up to 10 days. By some accounts, the site administrators will not follow up on deletion requests, leading to no follow-up.

name: Asos
description: Request deletion from customer services.

name: Atlassian
description: Go to the provided link and press 'Delete Account' and follow the instruction on the site.

name: Audiomack
description: Click the delete account link in the bottom left corner

name: Authy
description: Fill out the form, verify your phone number and e-mail. Data will be permanently deleted after 30 days.

name: Autodesk
description: Go to the bottom of the page, click the button 'Account Deletion' and confirm on 'Delete your Autodesk account and data'.

name: Avast!
description: Login, go to "Profile Details" tab, and simply click on the "Delete Account" button.

name: Avid
description: Fill out the Privacy Web Form and ask for either MyAvid Account Deletion or Data Erasure based on what you want.

name: AwardWallet
description: You must enter your password and supply a reason for deleting your account

name: Babbel
description: Scroll down and press delete. A confirmation box will show up. You will have to go click the link in the email they send to you to permanently delete your Babbel account.

name: Backblaze
description: Click on delete account and follow the required steps. You must have no outstanding B2 balance and will have to delete most files and settings in your account first.

name: Backloggery
description: Select 'Account Deletion' in the subject of the contact form.

name: Badoo
description: On the top right corner click 'Settings', then on the left hand side click 'Delete'. Type your information, to delete Badoo, enter your password and in the other box, explain why you want to leave. Click on the 'Confirm' button, you will receive a message page confirming your rquest was successfully completed.

name: Bambuser
description: Go to your Settings page and scroll down to find 'Deactivate' account. Click on 'Close Account' button, and confirm the account deletion.

name: Bandcamp
description: To terminate an artist account, you must click on the 'Artists' pane, click on the desired artist's profile, and click the termination link there.

name: Barnes and Noble
description: It is not possible to delete your Barnes and Noble account. The best you can do is delete any personal information that you have stored on their website.

name: Basecamp
description: Data will be permanantly deleted after 30 days.

name: Basin
description: Scroll down to the bottom of the page and click the 'Completely obliterate all my data' button

name: Battle.net / Blizzard
description: Requests may take up to 30 days to complete and may require to submit a government-issued photo ID.

name: Beam
description: Remove all personal information from your account, then request deletion by emailing customer services.

name: Beamly
description: To delete your account, login and then next to your name select the drop down and go to 'Settings' once there scroll to the bottom of the page and select 'delete your account'.

name: Behance
description: To delete your account, please click on your avatar in the top right navigation, visit Account Settings, and hit the 'Delete Account' tab. There, you'll have the option to delete.

name: bet365
description: To delete the account, contact customer service. It is recommended to do it via chat and ask to close the account, as there is no link to do so.

name: Betterment
description: Account can only be closed, but not trule deleted.

name: Bidoo
description: Click the assistance link on the website and fill in the contact form. A representative will mail you to confirm the account deletion.

name: Bitbucket
description: On the side menu, click on 'Delete Account' and on the confirmation page click 'Delete Account', all repositories and the account is immediately wiped.

name: Bitdefender Central
description: To delete your account, login, go to the 'My Account' page, click the 'Delete Account' link, click the 'Delete Account' button, and click the 'Send Email' button. A confirmation email will be sent to the account email. Click the 'Delete Account' link in the email sent to you, log into your account, and click the 'Delete Account' button.

name: Bitly
description: Go to " Profile > Delete Account" and select why you are deleting your account. Your account will be deleted but all your shortlinks will remain.

name: Blinkist
description: Click 'I want to delete my account' at the bottom of the page.

name: Blogger
description: You can't delete your Blogger Account without deleting your entire Google Account. But you can delete your blog.

name: Bluebird by American Express
description: Remove all funds from your account. Then go to settings in your account, click on the profile tab, and click close account.

name: BoardGameGeek
description: Log-in and use the link provided to request account deletion.

name: BodBot
description: Click the 'Delete My Account' link.

name: Bodybuilding
description: You can only deactivate your account by contacting support as they state on the help page. There is no way to permanently delete your account or data, and an inactive public profile will always be visible to public.

name: BookBub
description: Fill out the contact form to request deletion.

name: Booklooker
description: You need to request deletion of your data via the contact form after logging in.

name: botlist.space
description: You need to request deletion of your account data by contacting a 'Website Staff' via their Discord server.

name: Bring!
description: Contact support and ask for your account to be deleted.

name: British Airways
description: Must send a request in writing. See this page for contact details https://www.britishairways.com/travel/contact-executive-club/execclub/_gf/en_us

name: BrowserStack
description: Must send contact form requesting account deletion, using the "Other" category.

name: Bukalapak
description: Open Akun (Account)>BukaBantuan (Open Help)>In Akun & Info Personal (Account & Personal Info), tap Selanjutnya (Next)>Tap Menonaktifkan Akun (Disable Account)>Tap Isi Form Bantuan (Type on Help Form)>Explain the reason why you delete it>Tap Kirim (Send).

name: Bungie.net
description: TL;DR you can't do it. Discussion at https://www.bungie.net/en-US/Forums/Post/66636671

name: BurstNET
description: Support staff refuses to delete accounts due to 'accounting purposes'

name: Buycott
description: To cancel your account you have to send them an email

name: Buycraft
description: Buycraft was moved to Tebex, just click the 'delete profile' button in your account menu

name: C&M News by Ress.at
description: Just click 'Abschicken'

name: Call of Duty (Activision)
description: 'There is no way to close or shut down an account.'

name: CamelCamelCamel
description: Login to your account first. Confirm by ticking both boxes, 'I want to close my Camel account.' and 'I’m really sure!', and click 'Close Account'.

name: Canva
description: There is only an option to Deactivate account. To do this, you must login to your account first, then go to account settings and click 'Deactivate Account'

name: Car2Go
description: You need to call customer support and even after that can take weeks before confirmation of deletion

name: CareerBuilder.com
description: Must remove uploaded files first

name: cda
description: You need to contact with support

name: CDON.COM
description: Contact customer service via the support e-mail form and request deletion of your account under General Questions.

name: Celcoin
description: Contact the customer support via email and request the deletion of your account. In order for them to identify your account, include your full name and Tax ID in your request.

name: CEX.IO
description: You can't delete your account without contacting them. You must set the subject to 'Delete Account'

name: Channel 4
description: Login, go to account page and click remove.

name: Cheap Ass Gamer
description: Please email cheapyd@cheapassgamer.com from your account on file with CAG.

name: Checklist
description: Log in and go to your account. Scroll to 'Close your account' and click on 'Close Account'. Confirm by clicking on 'Yes' in the pop-up window. The account will be deleted immediately.

name: Chegg
description: Call customer service or contact them via chat and ask them to delete your account, or request assistance via their Twitter account, @CheggHelp. There is also no option to delete your payment methods, you need to contact customer support as well.

name: Chess.com
description: Your account will not be deleted but disabled.

name: ClassPass
description: You can deactivate your account from settings but not entirely delete the account itself.

name: CleverReach
description: Email customer services to request deletion

name: ClickAndBuy
description: Login to your account, then click 'delete account' on the page.

name: CloudApp
description: The site claims that you must call their support line (888-988-5036, ext 1), but they deactivated my account over email.

name: Cloudflare
description: Log in to the Cloudflare dashboard -> Go to 'My Profile' -> scroll down to 'Delete this user'-Link

name: CNET Download
description: You have to ask the support to get your account deleted. Choose the category CNET Registration

name: Cocalc
description: Click on 'Account', then 'Delete Account'

name: Code Red
description: You can't delete yourself. You can only change your phone nr. to a bogus number.

name: Codeanywhere
description: Login then click Delete Account button and enter your password.

name: Codecademy
description: Simply click the "I understand, delete my account." button.

name: Codenvy
description: Deletion option can be found in the "Security" tab

name: CodeProject
description: Beneath the gravatar image, check the 'Close my account' checkbox. Then click on 'Save my Settings'.

name: CodersRank
description: Click the Feedback button on the right and fill in the form asking for deletion. They'll ask for you to reply from the signed up e-mail and then delete the account.

name: Coderwall
description: Sign in then visit https://coderwall.com/delete_account

name: Codewars
description: Go to your 'Account Settings' and scroll to the bottom to find the 'Delete Account' section

name: Coinbase
description: Sign in then visit https://www.coinbase.com/close_account and scroll to the bottom to find a button to close you account. In order to be deleted, your account can not have pending transactions.

name: CoinBR/Stratum
description: Contact the customer support via email and request the deletion of your account. In order for them to identify your account, make the request through the same email address that you have used to create your CoinBR/Stratum account.

name: CoinPayments
description: According to their own policy, accounts can never be deleted.

name: Collegeboard
description: You have to call their customer service at 866-315-6068

name: Comment ca marche
description: Your messages will remain on the forums.

name: Conte.it
description: Fill out the form to request cancellation from Conte.it's insurance services.

name: Cook It
description: It is only possible to permanently disable the automatic subscription fee. Doing so will also set your stars back to 0.

name: Couchsurfing
description: Cannot be deleted fully, reactivation is always available. Fill out the request form.

name: Coursera
description: Delete acccount button is at the bottom of the account settings page.

name: Craigslist
description: Send an email to abuse@craigslist.org and request deletion.

name: CrashPlan
description: Start a live chat session and a representative will delete your account.

name: Credit Karma
description: Membership can be canceled either online or by mail. Once you cancel, you will no longer have access to your Credit Karma account history and you won’t be able to create a new account for six months.

name: CreditExpert
description: You can cancel by email but only if your membership includes insurance. Otherwise, an email cancellation will be ignored. You have to call 0800 561 0083 to cancel your account. This is the only way. More info here: http://experian.metafaq.com/help/CreditExpertBRS/Cancel_and_duration/CancelBRS

name: Crowdcast.io
description: You can pause your account for $10/mo or cancel your account.

name: Crowdin
description: Login to your account. Click on 'Settings', then 'Remove Account' (at the bottom). Choose one of the options why you want to delete your account and click 'Remove Account'.

name: Crunchyroll
description: You can deactivate the account after filling out a form containing the reason for doing so (radio button list) and typing your password

name: Crushee
description: They mock the very idea of wanting to delete your account in their faq: "Can I delete my account cause I totally h8 you guise??!!!111"

name: Crypton.sh
description: Scroll down the page, click at "Delete My Account", type your password and confirm your action by clicking "Delete Account".

name: CryptPad
description: Scroll down to the red 'Delete your account' button and then select 'OK (enter)'

name: Curve
description: They cannot delete your account immediately as they are obliged by the Money Laundering Regulations 2017 to keep your data for 5 years after you stop using Curve.

name: Cybrary
description: Go to "Delete Your Account > Delete Account".

name: Dailymotion
description: Type your password and confirm your action by clicking "Delete account".

name: Dashlane
description: You have to enter your mailadress and have to choose a 'why are you leaving' answer'. To verify this step you'll become a mail with a security code to fill into the form. After that your account is deleted.

name: Deadspin (Gawker Media)
description: You may discontinue your use of the Service at any time without informing us. We may, however, retain and continue to use any Content that you have submitted or uploaded through the Service.

name: Deezer
description: If you signed up via Google/Facebook setup a Deezer password at https://www.deezer.com/password/reset and click the confirmation link you'll get via mail. If you have your Deezer password, open your account settings. Click 'Delete my Account' at the bottom of the page. Enter your Deezer password and confirm the deletion in the confirmation mail.

name: Delivery Code
description: Go to My Account and select Edit Profile and then Delete Account. A confirmation e-mail will be sent to the address on file with a link you must visit.

name: Delta Airlines (SkyMiles)
description: You can not delete your account on the site. You must use the linked form. Then select SkyMiles → Update SkyMiles Account and request them to close your account.

name: Depositphotos
description: Enter live chat in the other department and request cancellation of your account or if it is not available use the contact form.

name: Desk.com
description: Required to send e-mail, but it is quickly responded.

name: DEV
description: Go to your 'Settings'. On the left select 'Account'. You can 'Remove OAuth Associations' and 'Request Account Deletion', the latter via email.

name: DeviantArt
description: All your data is ereased immediately, except comments which will remain. Accounts can be reactivated within 30 days. After that, Accounts can't be reactivated.

name: DHL (Paket.de)
description: Open the provided link, click on 'Kontosicherheit' and then on 'Kundenkonto löschen'

name: diasp.eu (Diaspora)
description: Click close my account and confirm with your password.

name: Dice
description: Go to your 'Settings'. Scroll to the bottom to find the 'Delete Account' section.

name: dict.cc
description: Account data will be deleted; the user name will be blocked to prevent reuse.

name: DigitalOcean
description: Click in the checkbox "Purge all of my account data" and confirm your action by clicking "Deactivate Account".

name: Discord
description: If you're a server owner, you'll need to either delete the server, or transfer ownership for account deletion to succeed.

name: Discshop.fi
description: Contact Discshop.fi's customer support and request for your account to be closed.

name: Dock.io
description: Log in, go to settings and click 'Delete my account'. Confirm by clicking 'Yes, delete my account'.

name: DocuSign
description: Follow the instructions at the linked support page; directions vary depending on account type and privileges.

name: Doodle
description: In your Doodle account select 'Delete Doodle account' at the bottom of the page.

name: DOWN
description: You can delete it in the settings page

name: Dreamwidth
description: Changing your account status to Deleted will immediately hide your profile and journal from other users, but your account will not be removed for 30 days.

name: Dronebase
description: Contact support to find out if you can delete your account.

name: Dropmark
description: Personal accounts can be deleted from the "Danger Zone" section at the bottom of your Account page. Note: Before deleting your personal account, you must first transfer ownership or delete all collections owned by your account.

name: Dubsmash
description:
Click at "Delete now" to confirm the deletion of your account.

You can also request the deletion of your account via email.

name: Dwell
description: It’s not possible to delete an account, you can either remove or replace your contact information with bogus details.

name: EA Origin
description: Contact customer services to request deletion. If you're outside the US this must be by phone.

name: easyJet
description: You have to fill out the Data protection request form on their website, providing your identification.

name: EBANX
description: Customer support says that EBANX accounts can't be deleted, as the information about user transactions (e.g: payments) may be necessary in the future for, according to them, "legal obligations and legitimate interests".

name: eBay
description: A few survey questions will be asked prior to account deletion.

name: eBonus
description: After submitting a contact form, they will ask for confirmation using email. After confirmation, account deletion takes 30 days.

name: EDDB
description: Request deletion in the contact form

name: Edpuzzle
description: click on the contrat popup on the bottom of the screen and fill out the form, an admin will email asking for your username and will then delete it

name: eDreams
description: Click on "I want to delete My Account".

name: EdX
description: There's no need to delete your account. An old, unused edX account with no course completions associated with it will disappear.

name: Elevate
description: You must send an e-mail to hello@elevateapp.com requesting deletion. You will then receive a response from support asking for feedback and to confirm the deletion. The next e-mail you receive from support will notify you that your account has been deleted.

name: Ello
description: Quoted from Ello: Go to your Settings page and click the “Delete Account” link. Once you delete your account neither you, nor we, can recover it. Also note that your username may become available for another person to use.

name: Elpais
description: Complete the form, they will send you an email where you must respond indicating the identity document.

name: Endomondo
description: Select 'Close Profile' at the bottom of the page, select any reason for closing your profile. After that you have to complete the process by clicking a link in an email sent to you.

name: Envato
description: You have to send them a request to delete the account using the contact form.

name: Epic Games
description: Login to your account, go to your account settings, scroll down to the bottom of the page, click 'REQUEST ACCOUNT DELETE'. An 'Enter Security Code' pop-up window displays. Enter the security code sent to your email address and then click 'CONFIRM DELETE REQUEST'. You will be prompt to select a reason why do you want to delete your account, but you can skip this step. Finally, you click 'LOGOUT'. 'Your account will be permanently deleted in 14 days.'

name: eProject.me
description: Send an e-mail asking for the deletion.

name: eRepublik
description: Create new Game Support ticket to request account removal.

name: ESEA
description: Click on the link and log in. On the privacy tab you can start the account deletion process. Click the button, enter your password, open the link in the confirmation email and enter your password again. Account will be deleted in 7 days.

name: ESPN
description: At the bottom of the account settings page there is a Remove Account button

name: eToro
description: At the bottom of the page, click the button to close your account, select the reason for your deletion and continue to confirm it.

name: Etsy
description: You have to contact Etsy. As they've stated, "when a member closes an account, it becomes inaccessible and will remain deactivated, unless the member requests it reopened. Account information remains securely on file with them, and Etsy has a detailed Privacy Policy that explains how we use members' information. This policy includes a statement regarding data retention."

name: Eventful
description: Contact support and they will delete your account

name: Eventim
description: Search for Account, select question 'How can I delete my account', then click on 'This answer was not helpful'. A ticket will be opened.

name: Evernote
description: You cannot delete your Evernote account, just deactivate it temporarily. Deactivation does not remove your data so you will have to manually delete all notes and personal info, perform a sync and then deactivate the account.

name: Expedia
description: Contact support via the live chat or the contact form and request the deletion of your account.

name: Experian
description: You have to call or email them. They respond to email quickly, however, so it is not that painful.

name: Facebook
description: While you can delete your account easily, some of the data including messages, are there to stay forever, just as stated in the website's privacy policy.

name: Facebook Messenger
description: If you logged in with your Facebook account, you can just delete that account. If you registered using your phone number, there's no way to delete your account

name: Faceit
description: See 'How do I get my personal details deleted on FACEIT?'

name: Fandom Wikia
description: Click on 'Close my account'. Disables the account but cannot delete user data completely. Retains user contributions and username is not released.

name: Fast2Pay
description: Nowhere on the website or the android app there is a 'My account' page or similar providing a way to delete the account.

name: FastTech
description: You need to create a ticket to request the deletion of your account.

name: Feedly
description: Log in and click the 'Delete Account' button.

name: Finanzblick
description: Click on your username (top left) → click on 'Profileinstellungen' → 'Account löschen'. All data is fully erased.

name: Fitbit
description: From the mobile app, tap the Account icon and select 'Manage Data' and then 'Delete Account'. Contact Customer Support (phone, chat, or Twitter) if you do not have access to the app.

name: Flattr
description: Type your password and confirm your action by clicking "Permanently delete account".

name: Flixster
description: Email privacy@flixster-inc.com and ask to have your account deleted.

name: Foap
description: Account deletion requires contacting customer support.

name: FogBugz
description: On the top right corner, click 'Admin' then 'Your On Demand Account' and search for the close account button at the bottom right. It is not really deleted, just closed.

name: Foodspotting
description: Account can only be disabled, not deleted.

name: Fotka
description: To delete your account, you must not post anything for at least three days.

name: FreeBitco.In
description: This website does not provide options that allow the user to delete their account.

name: FreeCodeCamp
description: You'll need to access your account settings; it's under a section labeled Danger Zone

name: Freelancer
description: Make sure your account balance is positive, then issue a support ticket requesting to close your account.

name: Freeletics
description: After choosing to delete your account, a confirmation e-mail will be sent with a link you must visit.

name: Freenom
description: This website does not provide options that allow the user to delete their account.

name: Freesound
description: You cannot delete your account yourself if you have sounds uploaded to your account. In their own words: "Because you have sounds on freesound, deleting your user is not a trivial task. As such, we ask you to please contact the administrators via the Contact Form. They will help you with the deletion of your account....". Alternatively - you can go through all your sounds, delete them one-by-one, and then delete your account.

name: Freshdesk
description: On the top tab, click 'Admin' then 'Account', at the bottom, and search for the 'cancel my account' on the right. It is not really deleted, just closed.

name: Fruux
description: You will need to go to Account setting and click delete account

name: Gadu-Gadu
description: You will find option to remove your account under Profile - My Account tab, after log in. Removed GG account number is going back to available numbers for new users.

name: Gamehag
description: Account deletion requires contacting Customer Support.

name: GameJolt
description: According to many sources, you can get your account stripped of everything and banned by contacting support, but there is no way to delete your account.

name: Gamespot
description: Account deletion requires contacting Customer Support.

name: Garena
description: Accounts are deleted with 6 months of inactivity or by opening a ticket to their support team.

name: Gauges
description: Contact support and request they delete your account.

name: Gawker (Gawker Media)
description: You may discontinue your use of the Service at any time without informing us. We may, however, retain and continue to use any Content that you have submitted or uploaded through the Service.

name: Gearbest
description: You will need to open a ticket. In the first field, select "Account Management > Advanced Account Information" and then send your message requesting the deletion of the account. Within 48 hours, the customer support will return your message asking if you confirm the deletion of the account. You can also contact them via email.

name: Geni
description: Delete any of the information you would like removed from the site. Then select 'Account Settings' and 'Close Account'

name: Geocaching
description: To permanently delete your account, you must contact them as the option in your account settings will not delete your geocaching logs.

name: GetCreditScore
description: Select the Delete My Account option on the preferences page and click submit.

name: GFace
description: You can't delete your account without contacting them. You must submit a ticket and set the subject to 'Delete Account'

name: Gfycat
description: You can't delete your account without contacting them. Send them an email from the address used to create the account

name: GHash.IO
description: You can't delete your account without contacting them. You must set the subject to 'Delete Account'

name: Giant Bomb
description: You can delete your account by contacting support.

name: GitHub
description: Click on 'Delete account' near the bottom of the page and follow the instructions. Some user content will continue to exist anonymously on the website.

name: GitLab
description: Click on 'Delete account' near the bottom of the page. Some user content will continue to exist anonymously on the website.

name: Gizmodo (Gawker Media)
description: You may discontinue your use of the Service at any time without informing us. We may, however, retain and continue to use any Content that you have submitted or uploaded through the Service.

name: Glassboard
description: Use the support email address to ask them to close your account.

name: Glassdoor
description: Sign in to Glassdoor, click the Glassdoor profile icon in the upper-right-hand side of the page, click Account in the dropdown menu, scroll to the bottom of the page and click Delete Account, and confirm deletion of your account by clicking Delete Account again.

name: Gmail
description: Click the trash can next to gmail, enter your new email address, and confirm the verification email

name: GMX
description: You can delete your account, by following the steps provided here: 'https://hilfe.gmx.net/account/verwalten/loeschen.html'

name: GoDaddy
description: Navigate to account preferences, select to "Close Account" and confirm.

name: GOG
description: Email privacy@gog.com and ask to have your account deleted.

name: Gogo
description: Email customercare@gogoair.com and ask to have your account deleted.

name: GoJek
description: Email customer service to request deletion.

name: Good Noows
description: On the top bar, click on 'Your name', then click on the 'Delete Account' button at the bottom of the dialog.

name: Good.Co
description: On the top bar, click on your photo, go to 'Settings', go to 'Miscellaneous' and then hit 'Cancel Account'.

name: Google
description: Click on the link, then enter your password and follow the instructions on the page.

name: GoPetition
description: Enter a reason for closing and your password and click delete, however this is more like a deactivation as you can contact them to undelete it

name: GoSquared
description: Select a reason for closing and it'll take 2 clicks.

name: gPodder
description: Go to account, select Delete Account at bottom of page, and click the red button labeled Delete Account.

name: Grab
description: Swipe left to right from the edge of screen, tap the profile picture, scroll down until you see delete account.

name: Grailed
description: Send an email to arun@grailed.com and request deletion.

name: Gravatar
description: You can't delete your Gravatar Account without deleting your entire WordPress Account.

name: Grindr
description: Submit an account deletion request via their web form, including all requested account details.

name: GroupMe
description: Go to the GroupMe profile page, then click 'Delete GroupMe Account'. If you are the owner of any groups, you must transfer them to someone else first.

name: Groupon
description: According to Groupon's privacy statement, you have to contact support directly and ask them to delete your account.

name: GrubHub
description: Privacy Policy Letter D: Account e-mail addresses cannot be deleted. However, an Account may be closed and GrubHub will cause the corresponding e-mail address to be scrambled.

name: GTmetrix
description: Login to your account and click on 'Request Account Deletion' or follow the link, Answer questions and click on 'Continue', Confirm deletion via entering password and click 'Delete Account'.

name: Guild Wars
description: You need to create a support ticket and request for them to delete your account. Before your account gets deleted you need to answer why you want the account to be deleted.

name: Gumroad
description: There is a link at the bottom of the Settings page to delete your account.

name: Gyazo
description: Scroll to the bottom of the webpage, and click the red "Delete Account" button

name: Habbo
description: Log in on the respective site and submit a request to delete your account.

name: Habitica
description: Log in to your account, click the User icon in the top-right corner, click Settings in the drop-down menu, and click the red Delete Account button at the bottom of the page.

name: Hack This Site
description: It is not possible to delete your Hack This Site account.  The best you can do is delete any personal information that you have stored on their website.

name: Hackaday.io
description: Login to your account, go to 'Edit my Account', then 'Delete your account'. You will then be prompted to enter your password. Then click delete.

name: Hacker News
description: Your contributions are there to stay, but you can at least clear out your profile -- even your email address.

name: Hackerrank
description: According to the site you must go to the profile settings url and there will be a button called 'delete account' which will delete the account if it is wished to.

name: Hackpad
description: Request acount deletion via email.

name: Happy Scribe
description: Go to "Settings > Delete Account > Delete my account".

name: Headliner
description: You have to send an email to support@headliner.app

name: Headspace
description: Click "Delete my account" and follow the instructions that appear.

name: HelloFax
description: Click "Delete my account" and follow the instructions that appear.

name: HelloWallet
description: Login, go to setting, click 'Cancel My Membership' and confirm.

name: Heroes of Newerth
description: The only way of deleting your account is by sending an e-mail to 'support@heroesofnewerth.com'.

name: Heroku
description: “Close your account...” link at the bottom of the page.

name: HOL Virtual Hogwarts
description: You can remove information and manually quit HOL, but your account stays forever.

name: Hostelsclub
description: You can remove every information from your account or if you signed up using a social network disconnect it.

name: Hot or Not
description: Sign in to your account, go to the 'Account' options in your settings and delete your profile. See also 'Can I deactivate or delete my Profile?'

name: Hotels.com
description: Click on your name, 'Your Account', 'Update your account settings', then 'Delete this account here'.

name: Humble Bundle
description: You must contact Humble Bundle via their online contact form to request account deletion and provide three or more transaction IDs from previous orders. They only deactivate your account though and state you can get back at any time.

name: Hybrid Analysis
description: Login to your account, go to your profile, click on the red 'Confirm' button, enter your password and click 'Delete Permanently'.

name: imo.im
description: You must login, go to your account settings and then click on the 'Delete Account' link on the bottom left.

name: IndieGala
description: Contact the customer support via email and request the deletion of your account. In order for them to identify your account, make the request through the same email address that you have used to create your IndieGala account.

name: Indiegogo
description: Go to “My Settings”, scroll down to the bottom, and click the “Delete” button.

name: InfoCasas
description: Contact the customer support via email and request the deletion of your account. In order for them to identify your account, make the request through the same email address that you have used to create your account.

name: Ingress
description: You need to fill in the form linked in the support article by clicking "contact us". Fill in your email address, agent name, device you play on and submit the form.

name: Inoreader
description: Select 'Reset or cancel' under preferences and click on 'Cancel account'.

name: Instructables
description: You have to email them (service@instructables.com) to get your account deleted

name: Internetometer
description: Site provides no user account management interface or account deletion options. Email sent to internets@technoized.com was never replied to.

name: Invision
description: You need to request them through the support form providing the email you signed up with. All files deleted will not be restorable.

name: IO9 (Gawker Media)
description: You may discontinue your use of the Service at any time without informing us. We may, however, retain and continue to use any Content that you have submitted or uploaded through the Service.

name: IoI Interactive
description: Login to your account, go to 'Account Settings' and then click 'Delete Account'

name: IRCCloud
description: Go to IRCCloud, sign in, click 'Settings', scroll down, enter your password in 'Delete your account', and confirm.

name: issuu
description: Closing your account will delete your profile and all of your publications. There is no going back, so don't say we didn't warn you.

name: iStudiez
description: Contact support and ask for your account to be removed.

name: itch.io
description: Log into the account and go to Account Settings, then Delete Account. Follow the instructions.

name: iTunes / Apple ID
description: Login with your Apple ID, and then click Get Started under Delete Account

name: iubenda
description: Click Account & Billing info, then under General info click Delete your account.

name: Jalopnik (Gawker Media)
description: You may discontinue your use of the Service at any time without informing us. We may, however, retain and continue to use any Content that you have submitted or uploaded through the Service.

name: JDate.com
description: Under 'Membership Management' click 'Remove my Profile'. Fill out the survey and submit to delete your profile.

name: Jezebel (Gawker Media)
description: You may discontinue your use of the Service at any time without informing us. We may, however, retain and continue to use any Content that you have submitted or uploaded through the Service.

name: Jimdo
description: You can instantly delete your free account. The paid version requires you to first cancel your subscription.

name: Jottacloud
description: Log in. Type in password. Press 'delete'.

name: Journey
description: If you go to the profile settings, you can deactivate the account, but there is always a button for re-enabling it, even if you delete its 'Google Drive' data

name: JSFiddle
description: Please email a request if you’d like your account to be deleted.

name: Just Eat
description: Click on your name, 'Your Account', then 'Delete my account'

name: Keepa
description: Login to your account. Click on 'Settings', then 'Account'. Click 'Yes, delete my account', enter your password and click 'Delete account'.

name: Keybase.io
description: Account is deleted instantly, though username might be kept to keep service functioning properly and avoiding impersonation.

name: Kik
description: You can only deactivate your account. There appears to be no way to permanently delete your account or data.

name: Kinja (Gawker Media)
description: You may discontinue your use of the Service at any time without informing us. We may, however, retain and continue to use any Content that you have submitted or uploaded through the Service.

name: Kit.co
description: If you need to contact us for any reason, you can do so by emailing us.

name: Klout
description: It can take up to 180 days for all your data to be removed from the system.

name: Koingo Software
description: Enter your E-Mail in the account deletion form and confirm the deletion in the E-Mail sent to you.

name: Kongregate
description: You are unable to remove an account, but they can permanently ban your account upon request. They will remove stored information upon request as well, such as e-mail address, developer payment information, and stored payment information.

name: Kotaku (Gawker Media)
description: You may discontinue your use of the Service at any time without informing us. We may, however, retain and continue to use any Content that you have submitted or uploaded through the Service.

name: Kraken
description: To close your account, you need to submit a request to support, which may take up to 24 hours to process.

name: Kununu
description: An email will be sent with a link to delete your account.

name: Last.fm
description: Scroll to the bottom of the page and click delete user account. On the following page, enter your password. Your account will then be deleted after 14 days.

name: League of Legends
description: Send Riot Games a ticket with the following information: account name, summoner name, server, email address used for account registration, registration location (City, Country), last IP used to play League of Legends, Internet Service Provider used during registration, and payment methods used to purchase RP. (if applicable)

name: Leetcode
description: You can't delete your account, though you can create a new session to reset your progress

name: Liberland
description: You can only disable the account, but never delete it.

name: Libre.fm
description: Click 'Profile', then 'Edit', then 'Show advanced settings', and finally check the 'Delete my account' checkbox.

name: Lifehacker (Gawker Media)
description: You may discontinue your use of the Service at any time without informing us. We may, however, retain and continue to use any Content that you have submitted or uploaded through the Service.

name: Lime
description: You must contact support via your Lime's contact form to request deletion.

name: Lingvist
description: You must contact Lingvist to request account deletion.

name: LinkedIn
description: There are reports that LinkedIn continues to email people with a closed account. You may need to contact customer services to delete account instead of just closing it.

name: Linsensuppe
description: One cannot even change the password

name: LiveJournal
description: Once you delete your journal you have 30 days to undelete it, in case you change your mind. After 30 days, the journal will be permanently deleted and there will be no way to recover it.

name: LogMeIn
description: Contact customer support and create a ticket

name: Lolja
description: Contact the customer support via email and request the deletion of your account. In order for them to identify your account, make the request through the same email address that you have used to create your Lolja account.

name: Lookout
description: log into your account, in the middle right.

name: LoseIt
description: Go to the Settings page of your account, then account information and click “Close account”.

name: Lottoland
description: Click on the link, log in, select edit on the top right next to "Account status" and then select "Close Account". Note, this will only disable the account, as the support can reactivate it at any time. To fully delete your account and personal data contact the data protection officer via email.

name: Lucidchart/Lucidpress
description: Click in the top right corner on your Username, then "Account settings" and at the tab "Close Account"

name: MacTrade
description: In your user account go to 'Delete Account' and confirm the deletion via the 'Delete account now' button.

name: MacUpdate
description: In your account preferences select 'Delete all my personal data' in the bottom left. 14 days after your request all your data will be deleted. During the 14 days the delete request may be cancelled.

name: Magoosh
description: Send an email to help@magoosh.com with the subject line, 'Need to delete my account'. Might need to send another email for the deletion to finally go through.

name: mailbox.org
description: Account Settings → Delete Account.

name: MailChimp
description: Account Settings → Account Settings Drop-down → Close my account → Type DELETE and press Delete Account button.

name: Mailfence
description: Go to 'Settings'->'General'->'Delete Account'.

name: Mailspring
description: Sign in → Click the 'Delete your Mailspring ID' button → Confirm

name: Mapbox
description: Enter Password -> Scroll to bottom -> Click 'Delete Account'

name: Mapstr
description: Log in to your account in the app, then in the account settings choose 'Delete my account'.

name: Marvel
description: Log into your account -> My Account -> click on Delete Account at the bottom of page.

name: Massdrop
description: Contact support via the online form and ask for your account to be deleted.

name: Mastodon.social
description: Login -> Account Settings -> Security > Delete Account. Note that this works for all Mastodon instances, not just the main one.

name: Match
description: You can only ever deactivate your account

name: Maxdome
description: Contact support via the live chat and request the deletion of your account. This is also possible via the contact form, though it could take longer.

name: McVIP
description: Click on 'Edit profile', scroll down to 'You want to delete your profile?', type in your password, click on 'Delete' and then 'Yes, delete it'.

name: Mediapart
description: No information is clearly provided how to delete account. You have to send an email to explicitly ask for deletion of every information related to your account otherwise they will only disable it.

name: MeetFrank
description: Send the team/company/email of the account you want to delete. No verification (not even from the same sender e-mail) required.

name: Memrise
description: A 'Delete my account' button is available from your account settings page.

name: Mercado Libre Argentina
description:
To cancel/delete your account, access the account deletion link specified above and log in to your account. In the options, select a reason why you want to cancel your account, click in the checkbox "Estoy de acuerdo", and confirm your action by clinking "Aceptar".

Warning: You may cancel your account only if there is no limitation, partial and/or total blockage applied to it. You will also be unable to cancel your account if you have outstanding payments and/or purchases. Mercado Libre and Mercado Pago are services associated with the same type of account. If you choose to delete your Mercado Libre account, your Mercado Pago account will be deleted too.

description:

description:

Warning: You may cancel your account only if there is no limitation, partial and/or total blockage applied to it. You will also be unable to cancel your account if you have outstanding payments and/or purchases. Mercado Livre and Mercado Pago are services associated with the same type of account. If you choose to delete your Mercado Livre account, your Mercado Pago account will be deleted too.

name: Metacafe
description: Request to delete account by contacting support.

name: Minecraft Tools
description: Minecraft Tools does not provide an automatic way to delete your account and you might not be able to delete it by contacting the support team either.

name: Mint
description: Go to 'Settings', then 'Sign In & Security', then scroll down to 'Delete your Mint account'. Enter your email and password again and click 'Delete'.

name: MisterWong
description: You need to send an email to support and it may take up to 48 hours to process your request.

name: MixCloud
description: Click on "Just delete my account".

name: Mixlr
description: Login to your account, go to account section of the settings page and choose the "delete account" option.

name: Mobify
description: You have to send a message in order to remove your account.

name: Mobills
description: Just click the delete button. Note that if you have made an account via Google or Facebook, you'll have to change the password first.

name: Mockflow
description: Login to your account -> Open the menu and choose My Account -> In the Profile Details tab click on 'Delete Account' & confirm deletion by entering your password.

name: Mojang
description: If you have registered a Mojang account and would like to delete your account, please visit your account settings page. Please be aware that if your account is deleted, you will no longer be able to log into Mojang services, and will not be able to purchase future Mojang games.

name: Money Dashboard
description: If you wish to delete your account and its belonging data and bank accounts held within it, you have to submit a request to the user support (or send an e-mail to support@moneydashboard.com). Make it clear that you require the full deletion of your account, not simply the deletion of one of your bank accounts. If you only want to delete/remove a bank account, but keep your Money Dashboard account open, please visit https://help.moneydashboard.com/entries/21936798

name: Moonpig
description: Contact customer services and they'll respond in 24-48 hours. Not to mention the ways they try to hide you removing your card details. If you want to remove your card details, do the following: The easiest way to do this would be to go to the My Account page then click on the ‘Add Moonpig Prepay Credit’ link, click on the Buy link and your saved card details will be shown onscreen. Click on the ‘Remove Card’ option.

name: Morningstar
description: Fill out the feedback form, asking them to delete your account. Be sure to specify that you’re not just unsubscribing from e-mail but that you want your account deleted entirely.

name: Mozilla Developer Network (MDN)
description:
Log in to Bugzilla and create a bug report to request the deletion of your account (see examples: #1576401 and #1353345).

If you have made contributions to the MDN Web Docs, you will also need to specify what you would like to happen with them after deleting your account.

name: Mozilla/Firefox
description: “Cancel your account” link at the bottom of the page.

name: Muambator
description: This website does not provide options that allow the user to delete their account.

name: Multiplay.co.uk
description: You have to contact Multiplay by their contact us page.

name: Munzee
description: Send an e-mail to privacy@freezetag.com. This email should include your first name, last name, e-mail address and, if applicable, your social network ID for the social network from which you access these services. (for example, your Facebook user ID)

name: Musescore
description: Click on 'Delete account' at the left of the page.

name: MusicBrainz
description: Click on delete my account at the bottom of the page

name: My Fitness Pal
description: Just login and head to the account settings to click on delete account.

name: MyFRITZ!
description: Login and select 'Delete Account' in the sidebar in your account settings

name: MyJDownloader
description: Go to your account settings (top right, click on your E-Mail-Adress) and select 'Delete Account'

name: MyScript
description: Accessing the URL triggers a confirmation mail containing a deletion link. Click this link and your account will be deleted immediately.

name: Namecheap
description: You have to contact Customer Support to delete your account, and provide your account username, support pin and reason why you would like to close your account.

name: NaNoWriMo
description: At the bottom of the Account Settings page is a "Delete My Account" button. Your account will be "disabled and scheduled for permanent deletion." After 30 days, "your past novels, author profile, and unique account info will be permanently deleted." It is unclear if forum posts will be deleted.

name: Napster
description: Start a chat and ask for your account to be deleted. You can delete anyone's account like this! Just "I'd like my account to be deleted." -"What email?" -"email@email.email" -"Ok, I have gone ahead and deleted it."

name: Native Instruments
description: Fill the ticket form and wait for response.

name: NCBI
description: Accounts will be deleted after 2 years of inactivity

name: Nearpod
description: Requires to fill out contact form. Will still get Promotional emails until you also unsubscribe from them

name: Neon Pagamentos
description: Neon accounts cannot be deleted, only canceled.

name: Neopets
description: Send an email to the unsubscribe@neopets.com stating you wish to delete your account.

name: Netflix
description: Cancel your membership, then contact support if you want immediate deletion, otherwise your account will be automatically deleted in 10 months.

name: Netlify
description: Press the 'delete' button and then enter your name to confirm.

name: Netology
description: It is not possible to delete your account.  The best you can do is delete any personal information that you have stored on their website.

name: New Relic
description: From the New Relic menu bar, select (account) > Upgrade subscription > Cancel account. Select the confirmation prompt.

name: New York Times
description: Use the form to write to customer services and ask them to close your account.

name: NextDNS
description: There is a button at the bottom of the page. Use it to contact support and request deletion of your account.

name: Nextdoor
description: Accounts can only be deleted by contacting their support team.

name: Nexus mods
description: Accounts can only be closed, but not deleted.

name: Nike Plus
description: At the bottom of the account form, there is a 'Deactivate Account' button. Upon clicking, there will be a set of information that explains the process of account deactivation. All account information will be deleted.

name: Ninox
description: Contact Support via the online contact form and request your account to be deleted. Alternatively you can use the support E-Mail address.

name: Njalla
description: Type your password and confirm your action by clicking "Delete Account".

name: noez.de
description: You need to create a support ticket at the given link and ask for deletion of your account.

name: NoIP
description: Check the box to confirm and then click 'Change'.

name: NordPass
description: "If you’d like to delete your account or data, please contact us at support@nordpass.com"

name: The Noun Project
description: 'Email us at info@thenounproject.com and we'll deactivate your account.'

name: NOW TV
description: You must first cancel any active passes under 'My Account' > 'My Passes'. After this, you can contact the live chat and ask for your billing information to be removed. Your account must remain inactive for an indeterminate amount of time before the remaining data will be removed 'in accordance with our group data retention and deletion policies'.

name: npm
description: Login to your account, go to your account settings, click 'Delete your account', enter your password, click 'Confirm password to continue'. Type your username and click 'Delete this account'.

name: NPM Forum
description: Login to your account, click on your avatar then click on username and select 'Preferences'. In the bottom page click on 'Delete My Account' and confirm the deletion.

name: nTask
description: To delete your nTask account, follow this simple procedure: Using your registered email for nTask, send a request titled "Account Deletion" to "support@ntaskmanager.com" mentioning your name and email address. Once the request is received, it will take 24 hours to process your request

name: Nubank
description: Nubank accounts cannot be deleted, only canceled.

name: Nvidia
description: Open the link, sign in, click 'Delete my data', click the confirmation link sent to your email, type in DELETE and press ok.

name: Odnoklassniki
description: Login to your account, scroll License Agreement down, click Delete profile, check any boxes you want, enter password and press Remove button.

name: OkCupid
description: Visit your settings page, and select 'Delete Account'

name: Onet
description: You just need to click 'Delete account', then enter your account password and tick the checkbox

name: Online.net
description: The french law forces them to keep your account because it's linked to your bills.

name: OnlineTVRecorder.com
description: You can deactivate your account with the link. But the data isn't deleted. Even if you contact the support they don't delete your data.

name: OpenCores
description: Though they state you can mail them, the e-mail bounces back.

name: Opendesktop
description: E-mail their support to get the account deleted.

name: OpenDNS
description: You can delete the account by visiting the delete account page.

name: OpenShift
description: You can't delete your account including all data, only a ‘soft delete’ is possible where you can always re-enable your account.

name: OSBuddy
description: You must contact support via your account's registered email address to request deletion.

name: osu!
description: You need to contact their support team and make an account deletion request. 'Please note that this is currently a manual process and may take several days to complete (contact us to file a request).'

name: Outdooractive
description: Contact Support via the online form and request your account to be deleted.

name: Overleaf
description: Select 'Delete your account' at the bottom of the account settings page.

name: Overstock
description: You must contact support directly and ask them to invalidate your account.  However, your transaction data may not be deleted from their records.

name: Pandora
description: Scroll down to delete my account and click it, click delete account, type in your password, then hit submit. If you have Pandora Plus or Premium, cancel your subscription, wait for it to expire, then delete.

name: Pantheon
description: In order to delete an account, you first have to delete all active Sites, or transfer the ownership.

name: Paper by FiftyThree
description: Login to your account, go to settings, underneath 'Request account deletion' click 'submitting a request'. Enter your e-mail address and click 'Delete account'. Might take some days until the account gets deleted.

name: PaperKarma
description: Send an email to human@paperkarma.com requesting deletion. If you have a subscription plan through the App Store or Google Play, be sure to cancel your subscription in the proper store.

name: Paradox Interactive
description: Go to support.paradoxplaza.com and create a ticket. In the first dropdown, select 'GDPR - Request for Account Deletion

name: Parcello
description: Go to settings, click 'Delete account' underneath 'Miscellaneous'. Confirm this process in the modal. Works within the app as well.

name: Parkmobile
description: To cancel your account, send an e-mail message request to the Parkmobile Help Desk at helpdesk@parkmobileglobal.com and include your name, mobile number, license plate number, and/or the last 4 digits of the card we have on file for you. After the Help Desk cancels your account, you will receive a confirmation e-mail message.

name: Passdock
description: Select 'Delete account' at the bottom of your account info page.

name: Pastebin
description: Password is required for deletion. Pastes will be removed and the username cannot be used again. No Recovery after deletion.

name: Patreon
description: It's easy to disable the account, just follow the link. Note that it doesn't make clear whether the data is actually deleted.

name: PayPal
description: Log in. Click 'Profile' near the top of the page. Click 'My settings'. Click 'Close Account' in the 'Account type' section and follow the steps listed. Your account is never deleted though.

name: PaySera
description: Quote from the support staff: If you want to delete your Paysera account completely, please write us an email (support@paysera.com) with a request and indicate why you want to delete your account. This email has to be sent from the email address that you use to log in to your Paysera account. Please be informed that if you delete your account, you will not be able to create a new account in the future. Paysera account is free of charge and we recommend not to delete it, but close the account, and you will be able to activate it in the future yourself by logging in to your Paysera account.

name: PCPartPicker
description: Click the delete account on your account preferences.

name: Peak
description: You must send an e-mail to support@peak.net requesting deletion. You will then receive a response from support asking for feedback and to confirm the deletion. The next e-mail you receive from support will notify you that your account has been deleted.

name: Penzu
description: Click on 'Delete Penzu Account'. Confirm the deletion through the link sent to your email address.

name: The Perfect Shave
description: Click on 'Konto löschen' and then on 'Mein Konto jetzt unwiederruflich löschen'

name: Personal Capital
description: Click 'DELETE USER ACCOUNT' at the bottom of the settings page.

name: Personello Germany
description: It is necessary to contact the support, for example through 'Mein Konto' -> 'Meinung abgeben'.

name: Philips Hue
description: Click 'Delete Account' on your account page.

name: Photobucket
description: To delete your account you will have to send an email to support@photobucket.com. Photobucket support will require some information for verification purposes. These include your username, email address, full name, dob, the postal code and country from where you registered your account and a description of a couple of pictures in your account. After your reply the staff will delete your account in 48 hours. According to Photobucket your old pictures cannot be recovered from deleted accounts as they will be completely erased from their servers.

name: PHP Classes
description: They refuse to delete accounts from the site.

name: Picasa
description: You can't delete your Google Account for Picasa Web Albums without deleting your entire Google Account.

name: PicPay
description: PicPay accounts can't be deleted, only disabled.

name: Pinboard
description: Send us an e-mail from the address that you have registered - we take care of it.

name: Pinterest
description: On the Account Settings, click 'Delete Account', state reason and click 'Next', then 'Send email'. You need to check the e-mail and confirm the deletion.

name: PivotalTracker
description: You can delete your account using the website, but it is only fully deleted after e-mailing

name: Pixabay
description: In your account setting choose 'Delete account'.

name: pixiv
description: It takes 2 weeks to delete an account. You will be unable to re-use the same e-mail during that period. They won't delete "pixiv ID".

name: Pixlr
description: Click on 'Remove account'.

name: Pixum
description: Contact support via email and request your account to be deleted.

name: PlantSnap
description: To delete your account, open the app on your mobile device and click the "More" option button. Then click your profile name, from there you will be able to delete your account. If you require additional help, use the contact form provided on their website.

name: Player FM
description: In upper right, click the settings button and select "Help/FAQ". Select option "How do I delete my account and leave Player FM?" - link will be below. Type "delete" in the box and click the button to finalize.

name: PlayPosit
description: Click your username in the upper right and select Profile, then Delete Account

name: PlayStation Network
description: It is not possible to delete your PlayStation Network account.  The best you can do is delete any personal information that you have stored on their website.

name: Plenty of Fish
description: Fill out the deletion form

name: Plex.tv
description: Under 'Danger Zone', click 'Delete your account'.

name: Pocket Casts
description: You must request account deletion via email. If the web player was purchased, access to it will be lost as well.

name: Podio
description: Log in to your account, press the delete button and type the phrase asked.

name: Points.com
description: Must contact support through Contanct form or online chat.

name: pon
description: Open the app → Open Settings → Click on your Account's information → Initiate deletion

name: Porkbun
description: Log into your account -> Click the link -> Click the Delete Account button and follow instructions.

name: Postcrossing
description: Log into your account -> Click the link (data fully deleted, not possible to revert this).

name: Postman
description: Log into your account, then click the 'Delete Account' button on your profile page.

name: Premera
description: Email Premera's support team to request account deletion.

name: Premiumize.me
