name: Prey
description: Log into your account -> Click 'Need to close your account?' near the bottom of the page -> Confirm deletion

name: Prezi
description: Log into your account -> Click the link -> Enter your password and click on Delete Account.

name: ProductHunt
description: Go to the account setting, click 'Continue' under 'Delete my Account' and follow from there.

name: Prosper
description: Log into your account -> Click the link -> Click on Close My Account Now.

name: Proto.io
description: You can either close your account temporary or delete it permanently. Log into your account -> Click Settings -> Manage Subscription -> NEED TO CLOSE YOUR ACCOUNT? click Yes, Close Account

name: ProtonMail
description: Log into your account -> Click Settings -> Scroll Down to the Delete My Account Button -> Type why you are leaving, password, and 2 Factor Authentication code if enabled -> Click Delete

name: Prott
description: Log into your account -> Click Settings -> in General tab scroll down and find 'Click here if you want to cancel your account' -> Choose why you are leaving and click 'Continue' -> Click 'Yes Cancel My Account'

name: Public Lab
description: It is currently not possible to delete an account on Public Lab.

name: Put.io
description: Click Destroy my account completely, then click Delete everything.

name: Quip
description: Email support@quip.com and ask them to delete your account.

name: Quora
description: Log in, go to 'Settings', 'Privacy', and then 'Delete Account'.

name: radio.fr
description: Login, go to profile page, it's in tab 'my data' and click 'delete my account'.

name: Raindrop.io
description: To delete your account, you need to send an e-mail to info@raindrop.io

name: Rainforest QA
description: Login, go to the settings page and click 'I want to delete my account'.

name: RapidAPI
description: Account can only be deleted by sending a request to their support team

name: RateYourMusic
description: After deleteing the account, it will be deactivated for 30 days before being deleted permanently. Messages, forum posts, and contributions stay on the site even after your account is deleted.

name: Razer
description: An account is required to access the warranty and product registration section of the website. Despite being on a different subdomain, this affects the normal Razerzone.com website and the assorted store as well.

name: Readernaut
description: Go to your profile page, and use the 'Delete Your Account' button.

name: RecargaPay
description: You can't completely delete your account. On the account closure page, you are informed that after you closing your account, most of your data will be deleted from the system, however it's not specified which data will be kept and why. Closed accounts can also be reactivated at any time by the user.

name: Reddit
description: You cannot delete your Reddit account; you can only deactivate it. Content posted to Reddit (posts and comments) must be deleted individually. If you are an EU citizen, you may request deletion of your personal data via email.

name: Redditgifts
description: If you decide you would like to delete your account you must email us at support@redditgifts.com. You must email us from the email address associated with your account and provide your reddit username.

name: RedPen.io
description: You would need to email the team by clicking feedback to have your account removed.

name: Replay Poker
description: Please enter a reason for deactivating your account and then click 'Deactivate' after you're finished.

name: RescueTime
description: Use the 'Delete your account' link in the lower right-hand corner.

name: Retrospring
description: Use the Delete button at the bottom of the page.

name: Revolut
description: Open the Revolut app on your phone, go to the Settings tab, press 'Close account' button and follow the instructions.

name: Rideindego
description: You can only cancel the auto-renewal feature. I called them and asked to cancel my account and be removed from their mailing list and they told me my account was already not renewing and there was nothing else they could do.

name: Riffle
description: On your profile page, click 'Edit Profile' and use the 'Cancel account' button.

name: Roblox
description: You need to follow the steps under the 'Account Deletion' section on the page. They may request some information to verify it's you.

name: Roll20
description: On the account page, scroll down to the "Danger Zone" and click on the "Delete My Account" button. After that, you will have to type "DELETE" in the pop-up box.

name: Rosetta Stone
description: Submit a personal data deletion request via the support site form using your registered email. Your data will be deleted after some time without any email confirmation. (Note: California residents must use this form instead!)

name: Rovio
description: Bottom link 'Delete Account'

name: Runescape
description: Under 5. Account Settings > A. Account Management > V. Account Deletion. You must mail or fax an affidavit to the Runescape office along with a copy of your legal identification

name: RunKeeper
description: Enter your password, select a reason for deletion, complete the captcha, press the delete button and then confirm it in the dialog.

name: Runtastic
description: To delete your account go to Runtastic.com & log in, click on the arrow on the right side of your user name, click on "Settings", click on "Login Data" on the left hand side, click on "Delete my account" at the bottom

name: Samsung Account
description: Click in the checkbox "I confirm the conditions above", click at "Delete", type your password and confirm your action by clicking "Confirm".

name: Sascha Moser - Ein kleiner Blog
description: Your account will be deleted after 7 days, if you don't cancel the deletion process before. Created content (such as comments) won't be deleted, but your username will be anonymized.

name: Scaleway
description: On the top right of the page, click 'Delete my account'.

name: ScanMyServer
description: Login to your account and follow 'Account Suspension' instructions.

name: ShareLaTeX
description: Click the "Delete your account" at the bottom of the settings page and type "DELETE" in the popup box.

name: Shopee
description: Tap Saya (me)>Akun Saya (My account)>Ajukan Penghapusan akun (Submit Account removal/Submit Account Deletion).

name: Shopify
description: Select 'Please cancel my account'. Choose a reason then select 'close my shopify store'.

name: Shorte.st
description: Log in to your account, access the account deletion link specified above, access the confirmation link received by email and select 'Remove Account'. Note: Your created links will remain working and you will not be able to use the same email for creating a new account. So remember to manually delete all your created links first.

name: Shpock
description: Requires e-mailing support to delete the account.

name: Shutterfly
description: Contact customers services by email or live chat and request deletion.

name: Shutterstock
description: If you wish to delete your account or request that they no longer use your information to provide you services, send them an e-mail.

name: SigFig
description: Contact customer service by email and request deletion.

name: Simple Machines
description: Enter your password to have your account marked for deletion by an administrator or moderator. You can do this for any other Simple Machines forums if the forum administrator allows.

name: Simplenote
description: Login to your account, go to account settings and click 'Delete Account'. Confirm by ticking the box, entering your password and click 'Delete Account'.

name: Sketchfab
description: You have to click on the button 'Delete your account', select the 'consent to delete all content' and confirm.

name: Skillshare
description: Login to your profile, click on 'Account Settings', click on 'Deactivate Your Account', and confirm by clicking on 'Deactivate Account'.

name: Skype
description: Contact customer services on chat. You’ll need to know whether you bought services from Skype, you’ll need to verify your signup email address.

name: Slack
description: If you are the Slack team's primary owner you will need to either delete the team or transfer its ownership before deleting your account. If you're not, you'll need to request a deletion from the workspace admin.

name: Slideshare
description: Sign in to SlideShare, move your cursor over your photo in the top right and select Account Settings, click the Change Password tab on the left, click Delete Account, click 'Yes, delete my account', enter your password and select applicable reasons for deleting this account, then click Delete Account. Note: If you created your SlideShare account through LinkedIn, you'll have to close your LinkedIn account.

name: SlimTimer
description: Email request required.

name: SmartRecruiters
description: You can deactivate your user account, but you cannot delete it.

name: Smashcast
description: Access your user settings page, click the "Delete Account..." link. Check each of the boxes that appear, enter your account password, and complete the captcha to confirm account deletion.

name: Snapchat
description: Enter username and password and click 'Delete'.

name: Social Blade
description: You can't delete your account. Customer support will also not delete it upon request.

name: SoftCreatR Media
description: Your user account will be deleted after 7 days if you do not cancel the process beforehand. Created content, such as forum posts, will not be deleted, but your username will be anonymized and protected from re-registration for 363 days.

name: SoloLearn
description: E-mail requesting a full deletion. It takes 30 days for it to be irreversible.

name: Sonico
description: Send a request to legal@sonico.com and request deletion.

name: soup.io
description: Put 'delete me' in the description box on your profile and mail team@soup.io with your soup URL and request a deletion

name: SourceForge
description: Data created by the user such as posts and tickets will remain and be attributed to the account, even if deleted. The username will not become available.

name: Speaker Deck
description: Scroll to the bottom of page and click on the 'Delete my account and all of my presentations'.

name: SpigotMC
description: You can't delete your account you can only deactivate your account. Go for this to your profile and click the report button on your profile and write delete me and wait.

name: Spotify
description: 1. Cancel your subscription at https://www.spotify.com/us/account/subscription/ 2. Public playlists will be anonymised, delete any playlists you want. 3. Go to the provided link, Account -> I want to close my account and follow the instructions. The account can still be restored within 7 days of the request.

name: Square Cash
description: Login into the support page and email customer support asking to delete your account.

name: Stack Overflow / Stack Exchange Accounts
description: If you haven’t posted on the site, it’s just one click. If you have voted or posted, please contact the Stack Exchange Team: Visit the contact form and select ‘I need to delete my user profile’. After you contact us, the team will reach out with further instructions.

name: Starbucks
description: They will not delete your account but upon request they can “scramble all of your information so that you don’t receive emails and none of your information is available to [them] for potential fraud”.

name: Startnext
description: Go to your profile settings, scroll down, and click the 'Delete profile' link. It may be possible that your account cannot be deleted for a number of reasons, such as: you have a project in the starting, funding, or end phase; you have an active partner page; you supported a project that is still in the funding phase and we have not yet received your payment or your payment has not been returned to you.

name: statcounter
description: Click the link, fill in your login info and confirm. It's reversible for 30 days, until your data gets purged.

name: StatusCake
description: Under 'Account' scroll down and click the red button 'Remove Account'

name: StayFriends.de
description: The deletion of your entry can not be undone. All your profile data, contacts, messages and pictures will be permanently removed. Your classmates and contacts can no longer StayFriends contact you.

name: Steam
description: First you must verify ownership of the account, then Steam Support will respond to confirm your identification. After it is confirmed your account will be locked and then deleted in 30 days. You can cancel the deletion by contacting Steam Support during the 30 days.

name: StepMap
description: To delete your StepMap account, let us know by sending an e-mail with info@stepmap.de and enter your username. The sender address must be your e-mail address that you have subscribed to at StepMap.

name: Storenvy
description: Log in, then navigate to 'Account Settings' > 'Profile'. Scroll to the bottom and click 'Delete my Storenvy store & account'. Click 'OK' when prompted to confirm.

name: Storify
description: Just click the 'Delete account' button in red

name: Strava
description: Account deletion is irreversible: Your account and data will be permanently deleted, and you will be removed from all clubs, heatmaps, challenges and leaderboards. Some data you created for the community, like public segments or routes, may remain on Strava.

name: Streamable
description: You have to contact support in order to delete your account.

name: Stripe
description: Account owners only, not team members can delete the account. Balances and pending invoices all need to be resolved before the account is permanently closed. Cannot be reversed.

name: StumbleUpon
description: You can reactivate within 14 days. After that the account is deleted.

name: SuperBiiz
description: You have to email them and request for your account to be deleted.

name: Supercell ID
description: Even after "deleting" your account, Supercell will still keep your personal information saved on its servers to, according to them, "business interests".

name: SurveyMonkey
description: Scroll to the bottom of the page and click 'Permanently delete account'. After reviewing the information, click all checkboxes and enter your password. Click 'Yes, delete this account' to confirm.The account and questionnaire data will be definitively excluded within 90 days.

name: Svbtle
description: Click the 'Delete Account' link. After 30 days the data is irreversible to retrieve.

name: Swagbucks
description: Use the 'Cancel My Account' link on your Account Settings page. Requires email confirmation.

name: Tablondeanuncios.com
description: Login to your account, go to Opciones, click Eliminar cuenta. Confirm by clicking I want to delete my account. Then, your account and your classified ads will be deleted.

name: Tagged
description: You can reactivate at any time by logging in to your account.

name: Taiga
description: Log in to your user account, go to 'User Settings' and select 'Delete Taiga account' below the save button. Confirm and done.

name: TargetProcess
description: You need to e-mail them to ask for the deletion to be processed.

name: Teachoo
description: You must contact teachoo to remove your account.

name: TeamViewer
description: Edit profile (menu item at the top right corner of the page) →  Delete account

name: Tebex
description: Just click the 'delete profile' button in your account menu

name: Technorati
description: It's not possible to remove your account, but you can remove your blogs.

name: TED
description: Contact the TED support team via their online contact form for account deletion requests

name: Telegram
description: Open deactivation page. Enter your phone number and one time password sent to your Telegram account. Delete your account then.

name: textPlus
description: This website does not provide options that allow the user to delete their account.

name: Things
description: In the Things app go to Preferences -> Things Cloud and select Edit Account. Then select 'Delete Account'.

name: Threema
description: In the app, go to your ID and select 'Delete ID' at the bottom. Alternatively go to https://myid.threema.ch/unlink and remove your ID with your revocation password. If you do not have one, you can only unlink your phone number and mail under https://myid.threema.ch/unlink.

name: Ticketmaster
description: You must submit a request to close your account via the form.

name: Tidal
description: Category: Privacy and Data Requests. NOTE! After you press submit, it says that the request has been sent. On 'Does this article answer your question?' Press 'X No, I need help'!

name: TikTok
description: Tap account (with people depicton, on the bottom right edge)>Menu (on top right edge)>Privacy and Settings>Privacy and Safety>Delete Account>Next>Continue>Delete Account.

name: TKirch.dev
description: Your account will be deleted after 7 days, if you don't cancel the deletion process before. Created content (such as forum posts) won't be deleted.

name: Todoist
description: At the bottom of the page is a delete account buttom, after clicking on it, you will need to re-enter your password.

name: Topcoder
description: You can't delete your account, but you can contact them via email to deactivate it.

name: Tor Project
description: You can create an account with your email address only. But you cannot change, close, or delete your account

name: The Tracktor
description: Login to your account first. Confirm by ticking 'Close my account' and click 'Close Account'.

name: TransferXL
description: Click on "Delete your account" at the bottom of the page.

name: Transifex
description: In the main navigation, click on your profile image in the top right corner; from the dropdown menu, select User Settings; scroll to the bottom of the page and click Deactivate my account; confirm you want to delete your account by clicking Deactivate my account in the popup.

name: TrashMail
description: In top navigation bar, click on 'Account', then select 'Delete account'.

name: Trello
description: Select 'Delete your account?' option to delete your account

name: Trillian
description: Select the option to delete your account and enter your username, password and the code which will be send to your mailaddress.

name: Triptipedia
description: Click on "Delete my account" and confirm

name: Troll and Toad
description: You must contact customer support using their 'Contact Us' form, and provide your account's e-mail address. The account will be deleted once a support staff member processes it.

name: Tutanota
description: Go to "Delete account", type your password and confirm your action by clicking "Delete".

name: Twitter
description: Your account is deactivated before being deleted. After 30 days of remaining deactivated it will then be deleted.

name: Typeform
description: Follow the steps in the link: Login, then click 'My Account', scroll to the 'Danger Zone', click 'Delete my account' and confirm.

name: Uber
description: Requires 'reason' to be filled out, and takes a few days to process. Once processed, you must click on the account deletion link which is sent via email.

name: Ubuntu One
description: Yes and no, it depends on which type(s) of accounts, and you will need to delete the accounts in the correct order. All accounts are tied to Ubuntu One's Single Sign-On (login.ubuntu.com), so that is the account you should close last. Everything else, such as Launchpad.net, cloud file storage, AskUbuntu, and other accounts should be closed first if possible. This is especially important if you have any paid services attached, to make sure you won't be billed for anything after closing the accounts. The last step is to delete your Single Sign-On (SSO) account. SSO accounts must be deleted manually by the Ubuntu One staff.

name: Udacity
description: A Udacity employee recommends that you stop using the account, which means there's currently no way of deleting the account.

name: Udemy
description: In order to delete your account, you need to first unsubscribe from all of your courses.

name: Uncubed
description: You can deactivate your account from 'Settings', but must contact them via email to terminate your account

name: Unfuddle Ten
description: Send an email with the subject 'Delete my account', it is the only way.

name: United Domains
description: Contact Support and request to delete your account.

name: Unity ID
description: It is not possible for users to delete their own Unity ID accounts, instead users must contact Unity to disable accounts. Requires that the request come from the email linked to the account.

name: Unroll.me
description: Click 'Delete my account' at the bottom of the user settings page.

name: Uptime Robot
description: Login to your account and click on 'My Settings' or follow the link. On the 'Delete Account' section click on 'I still want to delete the account' link & click on 'Send account deletion e-mail'. Check your email and open provided link. Lastly confirm deletion by click on 'Delete Account'.

name: Usersnap
description: Send an email with the subject 'Delete my account'

name: Ustream
description: Scroll down to the bottom of the 'Account Settings' page and click 'Delete Account'

name: Valleywag (Gawker Media)
description: You may discontinue your use of the Service at any time without informing us. We may, however, retain and continue to use any Content that you have submitted or uploaded through the Service.

name: vgy.me
description: On the Account Details page, there is a Close Account tab.

name: ViaBox
description: Request the deletion of your account through the link above as a "general request". The system might create a support account for your request, so state that you want it to be deleted too.

name: Viadeo
description: There's a button on the right, just under the menu.

name: Vidyard
description: Click "Submit a request" and request an account deletion, entering your email into the request form.

name: Vine

name: Virtualmaster
description: Log in to your account and contact the customer support using the contact form and request the deletion of your account.

name: VirusTotal

name: Viva o Linux (VOL)
description: Click at "Excluir conta", type your password and confirm your action by clicking "Gravar".

name: Voxer
description: Account can only be deleted from Android or iOS app, not the Voxer website.

name: VSTBuzz
description: Account can only be deleted by sending request to their support team

name: Walmart
description: Contact customer service to close your account.

name: We the People
description: Site provides no user account management interface or account deletion options.

name: Weather.com
description: Site uses the term "unsubscribe" to describe completely deleting an account.

name: Wedbio
description: You have to contact them via the "contact us form" to get your account closed.

name: Weebly
description: Click on 'Permanently delete your Weebly account'.

name: Western Union
description: To delete your profile, contact Customer Care or send an email from the account you registered with containing your name, registered phone number, My WU number (if applicable), and reason for deleting your profile.

name: WhatPulse
description: When logged into the website, select "My WhatPulse" from the navigation bar, then click "Unregister from WhatPulse" towards the bottom of the page. This will permanently delete the account.

name: WhatsApp
description: From the app: Settings → Account → Delete your account.

name: Which.co.uk
description: Require your membership number to be sent in the email. This can be found here https://www.which.co.uk/account/#/

name: whistle.im
description: Menu →  Edit vCard →  Account management →  Delete everything (cannot be undone)

name: WhoSay.com
description: Just click 'Deactivate'.

name: Wikidot
description: Click on 'Delete account'. Confirm account deletion through the link sent to user email address.

name: Wikipedia
description: 'A username cannot be deleted.' However, they do have some suggestions.

name: WishSimply
description: Enter your account password and click on 'DELETE ACCOUNT'.

name: Wix
description: Delete any built sites and subscriptions then follow the link to a deletion request form. Email is sent straight away with a link to confirm the deletion

name: WolframAlpha.com
description: For the immediate future, send a message to WolframAlpha, and your Wolfram ID will be deleted manually.

name: Woltlab
description: Your account will be deleted after a 7-day grace period. Created content, like forum posts, will not be deleted. Your username will be anonymized and protected against re-registration for a year.

name: WordPress.com
description: You can permanently close your WordPress.com account from your Account Settings screen by clicking on 'Close your account permanently'

name: workupload
description: Write a short mail using their web contact form.

name: WT.Social
description: Only deactivation is possible

name: Wunderlist
description: Click 'Delete Account' at the bottom of the account preferences panel.

name: XDA Developers
description: Click 'Data Deletion Request' and fill in the form. Make sure to specify if you want your posts deleted.

name: Xing
description: Select 'delete my profile' at the bottom of the page.

name: Yammer
description: On the above URL, click the 'Delete your Yammer account' link in the top right and confirm.

name: Yandex
description: On the above URL, confirm the deletion by entering the CAPTCHA code. If backup email and/or phone added you will need to send a confirmation code and fill in the code(s). Press "Delete account" and confirm deletion in the dialog box.

name: YouTube
description: You can request your data copy before you delete YouTube account.

name: Yummly
description: Select "To delete your account, click here" at the bottom of the page.

name: Zapier
description: Go to the URL, confirm your email. You'll be redirected to the login page. Confirm your email again and enter "DELETE" (all caps) In the "Confirm you want to delete your account" field.

name: Zazzle
description: To terminate your account, simply send a message via their web contact form to Customer Care that contains your username and the email address associated with your account.  Once you've done so, a member of our Support Team will disable your account and remove any products, both public and private, and disable your store (if applicable).  The account will be deleted fully when our system processes the next batch of account removals.

name: Zeit
description: You would need to email the team by clicking contact us to get your account closed.

name: Zeit Online
description: Contact the Zeit.de Team by email and request a deletion of your account.

name: Zendesk
description: Go to Admin->Settings->Subscription and click 'Yes, cancel my account'.

name: Zenkit
description: Login to your account, go to profile, scroll down and click 'Delete Account'. Confirm by entering 'DELETEMYACCOUNT' and click 'Delete My Account'.

name: Zoom
description: Login to your account, go to account settings, click cancel account. Confirm at the dialog box.

name: Zynga
description: Place Delete My Account in the subject line and include your first name, last name, e-mail address and user ID number for the SNS from which you access our games (if applicable) in the body of the e-mail.

name: Alternativeto.net
description: Scroll to the bottom of the page, then click on "Remove my account".

name: AddThis.com
description: Click on the Link, log in and Press "deactivate your account". Done.

name: OpenAI.com
description: Click on the Link, log in, press 'Help', select 'Send us a message', select 'Account Deletion' and complete the workflow for account deletion.

name: Triage
description: Click on the Link, log in, press on the account icon, and confirm your password.

name: Copy.AI
description: You have to send an email to the support team for them to delete your account.

name: Typefully
description: You cannot delete your Typefully account.
